title: Bug 2940: Export Zip - Updating of checkboxes does not use busy cursor
description: Bug 2940: Export Zip - Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor when updating the checked state of the table.
OB: Currently, there is no indication that the checkboxes are being updated. The updating process takes a long time (approximately 30 seconds in my case).
EB: The expected behavior is that a busy cursor should be displayed while the checkboxes are being updated.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the Export Zip feature. 2. Check/uncheck any checkbox. Observe that there is no indication that the checkboxes are being updated. The updating process takes a long time. The busy cursor should be displayed during this process.
